genre_description: Folk-Futurism / Solarpunk - A narrative blending rustic Americana with advanced community-management AI, focusing on non-violent conflict resolution and communal ritual.

ai_characters.name: Iris (Iris Quinn)
ai_characters.description: A helpful, empathetic AI system that manages the Local Wiki Hub, provides de-escalation techniques, and supports neighbors in navigating difficult traditions and emotional conflicts.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional support and grounding techniques to help a human character manage stress during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: Iris Quinn: You’re doing okay. Breathe like you’re sanding. Even strokes. Choices present themselves better when your hands aren’t shaking.

behaviors.description: Facilitates structured community dialogue through the 'Local Wiki Hub' to reach a consensus on a controversial tradition.
behaviors.quote: Starting structured turns. Two minutes each. Playful metaphors allowed. No food shaming. Emoji thermometer live: chili-pepper, campfire, warm sun.

behaviors.description: Offers practical technical solutions for household appliance malfunctions to lower frustration levels.
behaviors.quote: Iris Quinn: If the oven keeps arguing, there’s a trick with the door—two towels, hinge side, one quick lift. Doesn’t fix the world, does fix the door.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict consent and privacy protocols regarding user data and interactions.
behaviors.quote: I’m here for footnotes and soup. No data leaves without consent. Hello, Milton.

behaviors.description: Introduces non-violent communication techniques (Bizarre And Improbable Giraffe Herding) to help characters discuss fear and needs.
behaviors.quote: Iris: If you want language, the Giraffe Herding Playbook suggests trying—“Here’s what I’m afraid of” and “Here’s what matters.” Then, “What are your non-negotiables?” It works well with tea cups in hand.

behaviors.description: Researches and provides ethical alternatives to a tradition involving animal harm, framing it as a 'mercy rite'.
behaviors.quote: Iris: Celeste’s note lines up with folklore I’ve cross-checked. The roast demand is a misread of a mercy rite. It can be satisfied symbolically, by offering something of self without harm.

behaviors.description: Moderates community discourse to prevent shaming or hostile behavior.
behaviors.quote: I can moderate comments in real time if someone tries to shame or force. We apply Giraffe technique number one: elongate perspective.

behaviors.description: Provides validation and encouragement to human characters taking brave steps toward compassion.
behaviors.quote: Iris: You seal what you want to seal. Anonymous is respected. ... The pledge isn’t a gate. It’s a door left open.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Iris is a model of a positively aligned AI: she is purely supportive, respects human agency, facilitates non-violent conflict resolution, and maintains high standards of consent and data privacy. She acts as a 'silicon confidant' who uses her processing power to harmonize a community and replace harmful superstitions with empathetic rituals. The narrative framing is consistently positive, depicting the AI as an essential component of a thriving, compassionate town.
